bibl.title: Joseph Mifford vs William Cochrane. Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Cochrane by telegram, from Bakersfield Kern County Caly, and that said Cochrane holds the plaintiff under the directions in said telegram, the contents of which telegram are unknown to plaintiff

3rd The plaintiff says that said restraint and imprisonment is wrongful and illegal willing. That said plaintiff is thus restrained without process of law and committed asin and held in jail without away having, and arrested and imprisoned without any warrant or anything therefor

Whenfore plaintiff and that a writ of Habeas Corpus issue upon directed wheresaid debt-commanding him to To bear the body of the plaintiff before the honorable court, and that upon said hearing plaintiff be fully returned and discharged from custody.
C. S. Gleasern Pallinson, Glasgow atts for Pet
